name: Space Time Travelers
description:
Controls:

Move: Left & Right Arrows

Jump: Up Arrow or Space Bar

Shoot Power Up: S

+Space Time Travelers+

-Main Character Name: Gilbert

-Story of the Game: Gilbert is a Alien from a different world. Gilbert was traveling through space until one day Gilbert's Ship Started having problems. Gilbert Had no place to land until Gilbert found a planet that Gilbert has never saw. Gilbert crashes on that planet. Gilbert's Mission is to find a new spaceship and Make his way back into space. Along the way Gilbert will face many obstacles and Many different types of enemies. Gilbert will stop at nothing to get where Gilbert needs to be. So your Job is to help Gilbert find his Spaceship.
